content: Im a passionate Front End Developer from Leeds. I create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation. Currently working at Parallax Agency, I work across a wide range of technologies and projects. I have a strong understanding of UI, cross-browser compatibility, general web functions, and standards. It’s not just about writing code; I have strong interpersonal skills and I’m passionate about learning from a team and I am dedicated to becoming the best developer that I can be.
